sentence.text: Hirschsprung disease (endothelin receptor signaling pathway) is a congenital and heterogeneous disorder characterized by the absence of intramural nervous plexuses along variable lengths of the hindgut.

To discover additional risk loci, we performed a GWAS of 123 sporadic endothelin receptor signaling pathway patients and 432 unaffected controls using a large-scale platform with coverage of over 1 million polymorphic markers.
